safety-tools.Control.Title: Safety Tools
safety-tools.Cards.X.Name: The X Card
safety-tools.Cards.O.Name: The O Card
safety-tools.Cards.N.Name: The F Card
safety-tools.Cards.Pause.Name: Pause
safety-tools.Cards.Resume.Name: Resume
safety-tools.Cards.FastForward.Name: Fast Forward
safety-tools.Cards.Rewind.Name: Rewind
safety-tools.Cards.Rewind.Description: Let's go back and redo this.
safety-tools.Settings.GMOnly.Name: GM Only?
safety-tools.Settings.GMOnly.Hint: Safety cards are only shown to the GM.
safety-tools.Settings.XCardType.Name: X Card
safety-tools.Settings.XCardType.Hint: This card immediately stops play due to content.
safety-tools.Settings.OCardType.Name: O Card
safety-tools.Settings.OCardType.Hint: This card indicates that a player is okay with the content.
safety-tools.Settings.NCardType.Name: F card
safety-tools.Settings.NCardType.Hint: This card indicates that content is heading towards an 'X' and provides the opportunity to change the content or 'fade to black'.
safety-tools.Settings.PauseCardType.Name: Pause Card
safety-tools.Settings.PauseCardType.Hint: This card indicates that play should pause.
safety-tools.Settings.ResumeCardType.Hin: This card indicates that play should resume after it has been paused.
safety-tools.Settings.FastForwardCardTyp: This card indicates that play should skip ahead due to pacing or content.
safety-tools.Settings.RewindCardType.Hin: This card indicates that play should rewind before an event and resume.
safety-tools.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
safety-tools.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
safety-tools.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
safety-tools.dialogs.resetsettings.conte: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
